ask.description: Ask us about anything related to dotLearn and Python Programming language. Make sure to check out the FAQ first before asking the question to make efficient and effectiveness of answers given. If you have others questions to ask, contact us over 'email@placeholder.com'. Have fun on your learning journey!
ask.FAQ:
FAQ

What is dotLearn?

dotLearn is a learning platform in the form of digital media such as websites, video tutorials and online mentoring.

What is dotPython?

dotPython is another media of dotLearn created to teach Python programming language to create apps and programs.

What other media is available by dotLearn?

Since dotLearn was established recently at January, 2018. Created by a small team, updates and resources are still limited, thus contributions by people such as donations and feedbacks means a lot to us.

What are dotLearn's Missions and Visions?

We vision that dotLearn could live up to its motto, to learn everything everywhere on the go. dotLearn acts as a media to encourage mentors and experts to get their contents noticed by the masses.

How do I contribute to dotLearn?

Donation is one thing, but supporting by giving feedbacks and comments is another. We endulge you to create learning media (video, article, websites, etc) as well so that dotLearn has more contents and recognition in the world of online learning.
ask.promote:
PROMOTE

dotLearn is more than happy to promote your contents, as long as it helps people learn more about Python Programming Language. Send it over 'email@placeholder.com' with a title of '[PROMOTE] TITLE - SENDER' and your content will be promoted in about 24 hours after the email is sent.
ask.course:
COURSE

We teach the subject by giving the students courses and challenges. Simply type in the key word '/course' and follow the instructions given below the introduction and available courses. Happy learning!

ask.link:
LINKS

Links are given as sources of learning each course and lessons with some example and full explanations. The links are shorten to track each links statistics, so that data can be visualized and process by dotLearn. dotPython is another media of dotLearn created to teach Python programming language to create apps and programs. dotLearn acts as a media to encourage mentors and experts to get their contents noticed by the masses. If you wish your content to be promoted, type in '/ask promote' for info.

ask.python:
PYTHON

To ask a python related questions, send it over 'email@placeholder.com' with the title '[PYTHONQ] TITLE - SENDER', replies are a bit slow at the moment so please be patient.
